extension.summary: Patch Kodi skins for OzWeather Radar Support.
extension.description: Supports: Estuary (& Plextuary), Estouchy, Confluence, A Confluence Zeitgeist, Xonfluence, OSMC, Amber, Aeon (Nox Silvo and Tajo) - This addon attempts to patch Kodi skins for OzWeather radar support. - By default, will auto-patch your skin every time a new version of the skin arrives. - Skin folder **must be writeable!** - Creates a backup of the original skin files first and this addon can also restore those if need be). - By default, patches only the actual weather page. - For Estuary & Confluence, this also patches your VideoFullScreen file for weather during playback when video info is displayed.
extension.news: v0.5.1 - Also fix the VideoFullScreen files to work with latest OzWeather
